property.name: QUERY_STRING_UNBOUNDED_DEFAULT
property.value: select i_chronicle_id, r_object_id, r_modify_date from dm_sysobject where r_object_type='dm_document' order by r_modify_date, i_chronicle_id

property.name: QUERY_STRING_BOUNDED_DEFAULT
property.value: select i_chronicle_id, r_object_id, r_modify_date from dm_sysobject where r_object_type=''dm_document'' and r_modify_date >= ''{0}'' order by r_modify_date, i_chronicle_id

property.name: QUERY_STRING_AUTHORISE_DEFAULT
